extendedInfo.detail: Made with real cheese.  Per 1/3 Cup as Packaged: 120 calories; 0 g sat fat (0% DV); 630 mg sodium (27% DV); 3 g total sugars. See nutrition facts for as prepared information.  Contains Bioengineered food ingredients. Learn more at ask.generalmills.com.  Add ground beef. Add your own twist! Questions? Call 1-800-828-3291.www.HamburgerHelper.com. Looking for more ways to add a fresh twist? Visit hamburgerhelper.com.  Box Tops for Education: No more clipping. Scan your receipt. See how at btfe.com.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Enriched Macaroni (Wheat Flour, Niacin, Ferrous Sulfate, Thiamin Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Corn Starch, Salt, Modified Whey, Sugar, Contains 2% Or Less Of: Tomato (Dried), Cheddar Cheese (Dried) (Milk, Cultures, Sail, Enzymes), Onion (Dried), Garlic (Dried), Citric Acid, Vegetable Oil (Canola, Soybean And/or Sunflower Oil), Buttermilk (Dried), Whey (Dried), Yeast Extract, Annatto Extract (Color), Spice, Monoglycerides, Sodium Phosphate, Gum Arabic, Natural Flavor, Silicon Dioxide (Anticaking Agent).
extendedInfo.directions: For food safety and quality, follow the cooking directions. Refrigerate leftovers. You Will Need: 1 lb lean ground beef or turkey; 1-1/2 cups hot water; 2 cups milk. (1) Cook: Cook ground in 10-inch skillet over medium-high heat 6-8 minutes, breaking up and stirring. Drain; return cooked beef to skillet. (2) Stir: Stir in hot water, milk, sauce mix and pasta. Heat to boiling. (3) Simmer: Reduce heat. Cover; simmer about 10 to 12 minutes, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender. If necessary uncover and cook, while stirring, an additional 1 to 3 minutes to desired consistency. You will Need: 5 fully cooked hot dogs cut in 1/2 inch pieces. 1 1/2 cups hot water, 2 cups milk. (1) Heat: Add water, milk, sauce mix and pasta to 10-inch skillet; stir well. Heat to boiling.(2)Simmer: Reduce heat. Cover; simmer about 8 minutes, stirring occasionally. (3) Add Stir in hot dog pieces. cover and continue to simmer 2 to 4 minutes, until pasta is tender and hot dog pieces are heated through. It necessary, uncover and cook, while stirring, an additional 1 to 3 minutes to desired consistency. Into cheesy bacon deliciousness? Stir in chopped cooked bacon, shredded cheese and chopped fresh tomatoes before serving.  Try with hot dogs instead of ground beef.
extendedInfo.warnings: Contains milk, wheat; May contain egg and soy ingredients.
